div: Relationship between reindeer calving date from the Kutuharju field reindeer research station herd from 1970 to 2016 and (a) femalesâ€™ body condition index (BCI), (b) proportion of males in the herd the precedent breeding season, (c) amount of precipitation in April, (d) mean temperature in May, (e) mean temperature in April-May and (f) snow depth index (SDI) in April.
